markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer](/Feats.aspx?ID=875) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

You can use the unusual resonance of your [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470) to grant it additional effects. Choose one cantrip from the [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), or [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) list. You can activate your [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470) to cast that cantrip at will. As normal, this cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. Additionally, you can Activate your [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470) with a <actions string="Single Action" /> (envision) activation to transform it into a nondescript pin or brooch to hide your affiliation with the Pathfinder Society. This transformation lasts for 1 hour.

<title level="2">Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer leads to...</title>
[Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2229), [Westyr's Wayfinder Repository](/Feats.aspx?ID=2273)
name: Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer

<summary>
Access a new cantrip by using your Wayfinder.
</summary>
summary: Access a new cantrip by using your Wayfinder.
